full_text: JAN-02-2008 WED 12:00 PM FAX NO. 561835^^91 P. 02/05 ATTERBURY GOLDBERGER & WEISS, P.A. JOSEPH R.ATTERBURY JACK A. GOLDBERGER JASON S.WEISS Board Certified Criminal Trial Attorney Member of New Jersey & Florids Bars December 21, 2007 The Honorable Sandra McSorley Circuit Court Judge Palm Beach County Courthouse 205 North Dixie Highway West Palm Beach, Florida 33401 RE: State of Florida v. Jeffrey Epstein Case No. 2006CF009454A Dear Judge McSorley: Enclosed you will find an Agreed Motion to Continue Trial and a proposed Agreed Order Continuing Trial, Canceling Plea Conference, and Setting Case for a Status Conference. If this Order meets with your approval, please sign the same and forward conformed copies in the envelopes provided. If you should have any questions in regard to this matter, please do not hesitate to contact me. Very truly yours, Jack A. Goldberger JAG/slm Enclosure cc: Lanna Belohlavek, ASA One Clearlake Centre, Suite 1400 250 Australlian Avenue South West Palm Beach, FL 33401 p 561.659.8300 f 561.835.8691 www.agwpa.com Public Records Request No.: 17-295 07/26/17 DOJ-OGR-00030443

text_blocks.content: JOSEPH R.ATTERBURY JACK A. GOLDBERGER JASON S.WEISS Board Certified Criminal Trial Attorney Member of New Jersey & Florids Bars

December 21, 2007 The Honorable Sandra McSorley Circuit Court Judge Palm Beach County Courthouse 205 North Dixie Highway West Palm Beach, Florida 33401 RE: State of Florida v. Jeffrey Epstein Case No. 2006CF009454A Dear Judge McSorley:

Enclosed you will find an Agreed Motion to Continue Trial and a proposed Agreed Order Continuing Trial, Canceling Plea Conference, and Setting Case for a Status Conference. If this Order meets with your approval, please sign the same and forward conformed copies in the envelopes provided.
If you should have any questions in regard to this matter, please do not hesitate to contact me.
JAG/slm Enclosure cc: Lanna Belohlavek, ASA
One Clearlake Centre, Suite 1400 250 Australlian Avenue South West Palm Beach, FL 33401 p 561.659.8300 f 561.835.8691 www.agwpa.com Public Records Request No.: 17-295

additional_notes: The document is a faxed letter from Jack A. Goldberger to Judge Sandra McSorley regarding the case State of Florida v. Jeffrey Epstein. The letter includes an Agreed Motion to Continue Trial and a proposed Agreed Order. The document has a fax header and footer with date and page numbers. There is a handwritten signature and initials.
